product_warranty.warranty_details: Videocon does not cover warranty on products sold through Snapdeal, Extended Warranty can be availed for maximum 2 years and within 30 days from the date of purchase of product, Extended Warranty Plan will not be applicable if the difference between Manufacturing date of Product and Product Purchase Date is more than 9 months

Videocon does not cover warranty on products sold through Snapdeal, Extended Warranty can be availed for maximum 2 years and within 30 days from the date of purchase of product, Extended Warranty Plan will not be applicable if the difference between Manufacturing date of Product and Product Purchase Date is more than 9 months
